name: Famiguitar 2 (Universal)
description:
Famiguitar 2 is a very simple guitar app.
Simulates 8-bit video game console sounds.
144 guitar chords are selectable.

[How to play]

- Select a waveform.(Pulse duty 12.5% / Pulse duty 25% / Pulse duty 25% / Pulse duty 75% / Triangle)

- Select a chord key.(C / C# / D / D# / E / F / F# / G / G# / A / A# /B)

- Select a chord modifier.(Major / m / 7 / M7 / m7 / dim / m7b5 / aug / sus4 / 7sus4 / 6 / add9)

- Flip the strings.
